granular building blocks today I'm very excited to announce another frequently requested building block by many of our
customers in spread placement groups now spread placement groups allow you to
place instances inside of availability zone that need to have low latency with each other but you want them to have
independent failure characteristics think about a master and a slave database that you don't want to fail by accidentally being on the same physical
same piece of hardware when you put two instances or multiple instances inside
of a spread placement group you can be ensured that all of those instances are on physically separate racks inside of
our data center so that you have no single piece of hardware that can fail and cause those instances to fail at the
